name: mirdeep2
description:
miRDeep2 is a completely overhauled tool which discovers microRNA genes
by analyzing sequenced RNAs.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-pdf-api2
dependencies.description: Facilitates the creation and modification of PDF files

dependencies.name: bowtie
dependencies.description:
Bowtie is an ultrafast, memory-efficient short read aligner for short
DNA sequences (reads) from next-gen sequencers.

dependencies.name: viennarna
dependencies.description:
The ViennaRNA Package consists of a C code library and several stand-
alone programs for the prediction and comparison of RNA secondary
structures.

dependencies.name: squid
dependencies.description: C function library for sequence analysis.

dependencies.name: randfold
dependencies.description: Minimum free energy of folding randomization test software
